mapper.select: SELECT t1.F_ID, t1.F_NAME, t1.F_EN_NAME, t1.F_PRICE, t1.F_BASEPRICE, t1.F_CATEGORY, t1.F_BRAND, t2.F_SHOPNUM FROM T_COMMODITY t1 LEFT JOIN T_INVENTORY t2 ON t1.F_ID = t2.F_COMMODITYID WHERE t1.F_ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_COMMODITY ( F_ID, F_NAME, F_EN_NAME, F_PRICE, F_BASEPRICE, F_CATEGORY, F_BRAND, F_CREATE_TIMESTAMP, F_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP ) VALUES ( #{commodity.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodity.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodity.enName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodity.price, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{commodity.basePrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{commodity.category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodity.brand, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_COMMODITY SET F_NAME = #{commodity.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_EN_NAME = #{commodity.enName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_PRICE = #{commodity.price, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, F_BASEPRICE = #{commodity.basePrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, F_CATEGORY = #{commodity.category, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_BRAND = #{commodity.brand, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, F_UPDATE_TIMESTAMP = sysdate WHERE F_ID = #{commodity.id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM T_COMMODITY WHERE f_id = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
